rules:
This is rock, paper, scissors, liazrd, spock!
The basic RPS rules apply with these additions.

 - Lizard beats paper, lizard beats Spock.
 - Rock beats lizard, scissors beats lizard.
 - Spock beats rock, Spock beats scissors.
 - Paper beats Spock.

Lets play!
chooseOne: Choose one: rock, paper, scissors, lizard, spock
playAgain: Do you want to play again (y/n)?
grandWinnerCpu: The grand winner of the game is the computer!
grandWinnerHuman: The grand winner of the game is YOU!
